DataElement.preferredName: Whole Body Radiation Dosimetry Measurement Submission Format Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information regarding type of submission format for whole body dosimetry measurements.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Whole Body Radiation Dosimetry Measurement Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete._The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces._The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete.:The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.:The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting.

Concepts.definition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete.
The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.
The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.:Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.
